sentences.en: Complaining about perceived rivals . Blatantly trying to denigrate rivals, revealing your poverty mentality and desperation.
sentences.cn: 意识到有情敌出现就抱怨; 明目张胆的试图诋毁对手, 暴露出你的可怜又绝望的心态.

sentences.en: I didn't intend to denigrate her achievements.
sentences.cn: 我不是想贬低她的成绩。

sentences.en: I didn't intend to denigrate her achievements.
sentences.cn: 我不是想贬低她的成绩。

sentences.en: It was unkind to denigrate her achievement.
sentences.cn: 贬低她的成就是刻薄的.

sentences.en: people who denigrate their own country
This is very important, as users frequently denigrate applications that have jerky or overly slow animations.
sentences.cn: 这很重要, 因为用户总是经常贬低那些拥有笨拙或过于缓慢的动画的应用程序.

sentences.en: To assert this is to denigrate the effectiveness of the police.
sentences.cn: 坚持这一点就是贬低警方的办事能力.

trans.tran_en: to say things to make someone or something seem less important or good

trans.tran_cn: 诋毁，诽谤，玷污，涂黑，毁誉
